title: Doom Bots
body: I thought Doom Bots was suppose to come out in 6.21????

replies.body: It is. It's part of the rotating game mode queue and will be available this weekend (20/10-24/10) and next weekend (28/10-31/10) from 11AM to 3AM (AEDT) from Friday through Monday, just like every other time the RGM queue goes up.
